pivot.wtk
Class ScrollPane

java.lang.Object
  pivot.wtk.Component
      pivot.wtk.Container
          pivot.wtk.Viewport
              pivot.wtk.ScrollPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Component>, Sequence<Component>, ConstrainedVisual, Visual
public class ScrollPane
extends Viewport

Container that provides a scrollable view of a component, with optional fixed row and column headers.

Author:
tvolkert

          Component class representing the components that will get placed in the corners of a ScrollPane.
